response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am excited to present our premium product, which has been meticulously designed and crafted to exceed your expectations. This exceptional item is not just a product; it's an investment in quality and excellence. Given its unique features and unparalleled craftsmanship, we believe it is worth more than $1,500,000 to us. However, to make this opportunity accessible to you, we are offering it at a special introductory price of $1,200,000. This is an exclusive offer tailored for discerning buyers like yourself who appreciate the finer things in life. We look forward to discussing how this product could enhance your lifestyle or business. Please let us know if you would like to proceed with this offer.", "product_price": 1200000}
